name: Research Quality Association
memberOrga: None - RQA has individual members only.
goal:
Mission
1. To develop and promote quality standards in scientific research.
2. To facilitate knowledge sharing and transfer through:
Discussion, Training, Seminars, Forums, Conferences, Publications, Partnership and co-operation.
3. To liaise with regulatory agencies in the development and interpretation of regulations and guidance.
interests: Education and training, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Good Clinical Practices, Good Laboratory Practices, Good Research Practices, Quality Assurance (QA), Good Pharmacovigilance Practices, Medical Devices, Digital Systems, Data Integrity, Auditing, Inspections.
